item.title: ACC files 512 cases, freezes Tk 222b worth of bank accounts in a year
item.description: The Anti-Corruption Commission (ACC) filed a total of 512 cases and froze Tk 222 billion worth of bank accounts between December 2024 and October 2025. The figures were revealed at a view-exchange meeting on the occasion of the Commission's 21st anniversary at its headquarters in Dhaka on Tuesday.
